title: Strategic Management: Concepts and Cases 15th Global c2015 David
description:
Strategic Management: A Competitive Advantage Approach - Concepts & Cases, 15th Global Edition (c2015), textbook by Fred R. David and Forest R. David.

TEXTBOOK INFO:
Int'l: <a href=" http://catalogue.pearsoned.co.uk/catalog/academic/product?ISBN=9781292016894" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://catalogue.pearsoned.co.uk/catalog/academic/product?ISBN=9781292016894</a>
Nat'l: <a href=" http://www.pearsonhighered.com/educator/product/9780133444797.page" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.pearsonhighered.com/educator/product/9780133444797.page</a>

NOTE: The 15th international (global) and national editions differ only by the
      cover, the copyright page and the way pages are numbered.

COURSES: Strategic Management (Management - Strategy)

BRIEF CONTENTS:
--------------
1. Strategic Management Essentials
   (The Cohesion Case: adidas Group - 2013)
2. Outside-USA Strategic Planning
3. Ethics/Social Responsibility/Sustainability
4. Types of Strategies
5. Vision and Mission Analysis
6. The Internal Audit
7. The External Audit
8. Strategy Generation and Selection
9. Strategy Implementation
10. Strategy Execution
11. Strategy Monitoring
APPENDIX: Guidelines for Case Analysis
